section.title: XML schema
section.para: Analysis job files are written in an XML format pertaining to the XML namespace "http://eobjects.org/analyzerbeans/job/1.0".

For XML-savvy readers, who prefer to use XML schema aware editors to edit their XML files, you can find the XML schema for this namespace here: http://eobjects.org/svn/AnalyzerBeans/trunk/src/main/resources/job.xsd
.
